#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define ull unsigned long long

using namespace std;

ull josephus(ull n, ull k)
{
    if(n==1)
        return 1;
    else
        return (((josephus(n-1,k)+(k-1))%n)+1);
}

int main() {
    
    ull n,k;
    
    cin>>n>>k;
    
    cout<<josephus(n,k)<<endl;
    
	return 0;
}
